mapper.insert: insert into ams_trade_instruct_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_trade_instruct as tb where instruct_id= #{instruct_id}
